title: Queen
description: In a world where monsters rule, it’s a game of cat and mouse among those with the biggest teeth and claws. When the postapocalyptic dust settles, it’s time to draw lines and chose your friends wisely.After concluding the alpha title is hers whether she wants it or not, Marinah faces her biggest challenge after finding a traitor among her people. The Federation’s determination to increase their evil pressure, doesn’t help.King’s focus is his mate. He’ll protect Marinah with his life and possibly the lives of every man and women on the island. He’ll also give as good as he gets when her Doc Martin boots grow too small for her big bad Nova feet and she gives him attitude.In a time of monster’s, she’s QUEEN.
author: Holly S. Roberts
